name: Caliber Equipment, Inc.
tag_list: floor-care-technology, floor-cleaning-techniques, green-floor-cleaning, floor-scrubbers, floor-sweepers, floor-cleaning-machines, industrial-floor-care, commcercial-floor-cleaning
overview:
Caliber Equipment is a family-owned and run small business based out of Richmond, VA.

We pride ourselves at representing the leading edge of cleaning technology, and promoting the newest advances in floor care equipment and techniques including green and chemical-free cleaning. That said, customer satisfaction is our number one priority and we value our personal relationships with our customers!

external_links.title: Caliber Equipment - Your Source for Floor Care and Cleaning
